ygData.subject: Re: Attack on the Ark
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She looked up and saw a bot standing over her. Yes this is the ark. She groaned as pain ran through her body.  The gash in her side hurt like heck.

::Spears::

She looked up and saw a bot standing over her. "Yes this is the ark." 
She groaned as pain ran through her body.  The gash in her side hurt 
like heck. Shrapnel was sticking out of her legs, side and 
torso. "I'm....I'm on the maximal side." She groaned again.
"Who..Who are you?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Jonathan Hogan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> {Xiane}
> 
>     Xiane was making good pace and his internal repair programs were
> seemingly on the mend, his freshly repaired scanners blared inside 
his
> metallic skull as it picked up a heavy battle going on quite a few 
clicks
> away.
> 
>     Galloping full speed the horse bot made good progress, cresting 
a large
> hill visual contact was made. Several bots seemed to be in conflict
> over...no it couldn't be. This couldn't be earth could it and 
that...That
> could not be the ark of legend!
> 
>     Transforming Xiane stood upon the hill a good distance from the 
battle
> but began to run, he wasn't sure who was good or who was in the 
wrong but if
> that was the ark it must be protected.
> 
>     Tearing up the ground as he ran he drew one object then 
another. In his
> right fist he clenched a bladeless hilt, with a flick of a button 
his
> energon sword flared to life, humming warmly in his fingers. The 
other
> object was much like a door sheild yet the main face of it was 
empty until
> it too was turned on, an energy sheild filling the gaps to provide
> protection.
> 
>     Xiane arrived just as Spears was blasted from her spot behind 
the metal
> plate, kneeling down he examined the bot. "Hail to thee m'lady, it 
seems I
> find myself on a battlefeild yet know not the very sides I face. By 
the
> matrix speak what hast befallen here and speak true, is yonder the 
ark...?"
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <logomorph@h...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, August 15, 2000 8:30 PM
> Subject: Re: Attack on the Ark
> 
> 
> > ::Spears/Shadow Wing::
> >
> > Spears::
> > She shot hits the plate and it explodes, sending shrapnel into her
> > body.  She lays on the ground, motionless, leaking mech fluid,
> > gasping for breath.
> >
> > Shadow Wing::
> > She sees Dark One heading right for her.  She glided in right 
between
> > the shots. They miss her by centimeters.  She flies closer and 
uses
> > her talons to scratch the cockpit glass as she turns and flies
> > straight upwards in a right angle to Dark One.
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Lord Unitron" <KSLawdogg@c...> wrote:
> > > Dark One/Hiss:
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > He cursed as a spear dug into his left side, though, it hit no
> > vital
> > > parts.  Similar to what humans called a "flesh wound".  He 
raised
> > his
> > > missile launcher firing a rocket off at Spears.  (Or the plate
> > she's
> > > hiding behind).
> > >
> > > ---
> > >
> > > Dark One pulled up, a shot skinning one of his back fins near 
his
> > > engines.  He was now upside down, facing Shadow Wing.  He opened
> > fire
> > > with a barrage of 5 rapid laser bolts, not wanting to use up to
> > much
> > > energy to take out such a simple target.
> >
> >
> > 
> >
> >
> >
